snippet: President Abdullah Gul signed a measure into law on Friday that makes it a crime to administer emergency first aid without government authorization.
abstract: Turkish Pres Abdullah Gul signs a measure into law over the objections of human rights and medical groups that makes it a crime to administer emergency first aid without government authorization.
lead_paragraph: President Abdullah Gul signed a measure into law on Friday that makes it a crime to administer emergency first aid without government authorization.

keywords.value: Human Rights and Human Rights Violations
keywords.name: subject
